root_causes: GPA Mismatch - Students with GPA below minimum shown ineligible scholarships
Expired Deadline - Scholarships past deadline still appearing in matches
Wrong State/Residency - Location-restricted scholarships shown to out-of-state students
Wrong Major - Major-specific scholarships shown to students in different fields

gpa_false_positives.example: Student with 2.8 GPA matched to scholarship requiring 3.5 minimum

deadline_false_positives.example: Scholarship with Jan 1 deadline shown to student on Jan 15

residency_false_positives.example: California-only scholarship shown to Texas resident

major_false_positives.example: Engineering scholarship shown to English major

impact_analysis.trust_score_impact: Negative - Users report frustration when applying to ineligible scholarships
impact_analysis.churn_risk: High FPR users 2.3x more likely to churn in 30 days

remediation_strategy: Implement Hard Filters (GPA, Residency, Deadline, Major) BEFORE vector/semantic scoring
